disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Assassin's Mark.

blurb.value: Innate: Dealing damage with her abilities to a champion creates a ring of energy around them. Exiting that ring empowers Akali's next basic attack with  bonus range and magic damage.

description.value: Innate: Akali's ability damage against enemy champions creates a ring around them for 4 seconds and grants her 40 / 50 / 60 / 70% (based on level)  bonus movement speed for 2 seconds while moving away from them. Subsequent ability damage while a ring is active will only refresh its duration.

description2.value: If Akali leaves the ring within its duration, she regains the bonus movement speed towards enemy champions for 2 seconds and gains Swinging Kama for 4 seconds.

description3.value: Swinging Kama: Akali's next basic attack's  range is doubled, deals 39 − 180 (based on level) (+ 60% bonus AD) (+ 50% AP) bonus magic damage and restores  10 / 15 / 20 (based on level) energy.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Swinging Kama gives a static bonus range which doesn't change if Akali's range changes during it (i.e Rapid Firecannon): If Rapid Firecannon fully charges within Swinging Kama's duration, Akali's total range increases to 337.5. If Rapid Firecannon fully charges before gaining Swinging Kama, Akali's total range is increased to 395. The ring will create around the last target hit of Five Point Strike. PENDING FOR TEST: Empowered attack interaction with parrying effects ( dodge, block, blind).
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Five Point Strike.

blurb.value: Active: Akali throws out five kunai, dealing magic damage based on her  attack damage and  ability power, and slowing targets hit at the maximum range.

description.value: Active: Akali throws a flurry of kunais in the target direction, dealing magic damage to enemies hit. Enemies hit at maximum range are also slowed by 50% for 0.5 seconds.

description2.value: At rank 5, Five Point Strike deals「 25% bonus magic damage 」「 162.5 (+ 81.25% AD) (+ 75% AP) total magic damage 」to minions and monsters.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Cast location is determined at the end of cast time.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Twilight Shroud.

blurb.value: Active: Akali drops a cover of smoke and briefly gains  bonus movement speed. While inside the shroud, Akali becomes invisible. Attacking or using abilities will briefly reveal her.

description.value: Active: Akali restores  80 energy, gains  bonus movement speed that decays over 2 seconds, and detonates a smoke bomb a fixed distance away in the target direction, creating a circular shroud that expands over the next 5 seconds into a ring. The shroud does not permeate terrain.

description2.value: Entering the shroud renders Akali invisible, unless she is dashing.

description3.value: Akali's basic attacks and abilities will break the invisibility and prevent her from entering it for 1 − 0.625 (based on minutes) seconds, refreshing on subsequent attacks and casts.

description4.value: The marked section of Twilight Shroud's will linger for the mark's duration, even after the shroud ends.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Akali will also not gain the invisibility if she is Recalling. It is possible for Akali to detonate the smoke bomb on the far side of terrain from her current location. The effects are applied before the cast time.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Shuriken Flip.

blurb.value: Active: Akali dashes backward and fire a shuriken forward, dealing magic damage. The first enemy or smoke cloud hit is marked. Re-cast to dash to the marked target, dealing damage again.

description.value: Active: Akali flips in the opposite direction and fires a shuriken in the target direction that stops upon hitting an enemy, dealing them magic damage.

description2.value: The shuriken marks the enemy or the last smoke section hit for 3 seconds. While the target or smoke section is marked, Akali can reactivate Shuriken Flip.

description3.value: Recast: Akali dashes towards the marked target or smoke section, consuming the mark, regardless of distance. Against enemies it deals the same magic damage upon arrival.

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: * Both casts count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade, charging Spellbinder, and stacking Force Pulse. Killing an enemy with the shuriken will still mark the last area of the shroud hit. Attacking Disabled Abilities Five Point Strike and Twilight Shroud are usable. Shuriken Flip is disabled for 10 seconds and then interrupts. Both dashes of Perfect Execution interrupt. Movement Disabled Items Usable All the other item-actives are usable Disabled N/A Interrupted by Hextech Protobelt-01 Consumables Usable Spells Usable Barrier Clarity Cleanse Exhaust Ghost Heal Ignite Smite Teleport Recall Disabled Hexflash Interrupted by Flash Interrupted by Death Silencing effects

disp_name.description:
Name of the ability
Only necessary if the value differs from Perfect Execution.

blurb.value: Active: Akali dashes over a target enemy champion, damaging all enemies she strikes with physical damage. She may then recast the ability to dash in a direction, executing all enemies she strikes with magic damage.

description.value: Active: Akali dashes 675 − 825 (based on distance from target) units towards the target enemy champion, dealing physical damage to all enemies in her path.

description2.value: Perfect Execution can be recast after a 2.5 second static cooldown within 10 seconds of the first activation.

description3.value: Recast: Akali dashes in the target direction, dealing magic damage to all enemies in her path, increased by 0% − 200% (based on target's missing health).

leveling3.value: Minimum Magic Damage:»75 / 110 / 145 / 180 / 215 (+ 30% AP)«Maximum Magic Damage:225 / 330 / 435 / 540 / 645 (+ 90% AP)

targeting.description: Permafrost is a single target ability.

affects.description: Permafrost affects enemy champions and large monsters

damagetype.value: Physical / Magic

onhiteffects.description: onhiteffects can be set to 'true', for abilities that apply on-hit effects (from items or other abilities)

occurrence.description: occurrence can either be set to 'hit' or 'attack', and refers to on-hit effects

spellshield.description: spellshield can either be set to true, or written with a custom description.

callforhelp.description: callforhelp determines whether minion aggro will transfer to the caster

additional.description: Displays additional information in a smaller window below the template.

notes.value: *Both casts count as ability activations for the purposes of on-cast effects such as Spellblade, charging Spellbinder, and stacking Force Pulse. Casting Flash during either dashes will interrupt them, but Akali will deal damage to any enemies she comes in contact with at the new location. Enemies already hit by either of Perfect Execution's casts cannot be affected more than once by the same cast.
notes.description: Displays additional information with effect table to the right.
